wikipedia_page.main: John William Park (born 14 September 1973) is a former Scottish Labour Party politician.  He was elected as a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Mid Scotland and Fife electoral region in May 2007. Park was re-elected in 2011, but resigned his seat with effect from 7 December 2012 and was succeeded by Jayne Baxter.
